channel.title: [PI] No idea what to call this
channel.description: Uhm well, basically when i try to go up the stairs, i go directly to this spot [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/uoi6a.jpg[/img] I need to go to that spot to go up the stairs, here is the code i used in actionhandler.java [code]case 11511: if (c.absX == 3105 && c.absY == 3363) { c.getPA().movePlayer(3105, 3364, 2); }[/code] [code]Case 11511: - The staircase ID (c.absX == 3105 && c.absY == 3363) - Where i have to stand (Ive tried where i am standing right now and it didnt work) c.getPA().movePlayer(3105, 3364, 2); - Where it should move me to.[/code] Im trying to add a quest and I need to be able to go up the stairs :P

item.title: [PI] No idea what to call this
item.dc:creator: @Runeflection Runeflection
item.description:
@Runeflection wrote:

That’s probably because the object size is defined wrong. For instance, maybe try the coordinates on another corner of the object. That will be the issue. You need to define the offset.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] No idea what to call this

item.title: [PI] No idea what to call this
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

[quote=“Runeflection, post:2, topic:465576”]You can’t because the object is 2x2. That square is part of the object. Just use the coordinates that you are able to stand on…[/quote]I did, the spot where i am standing in the picture. But when i stand there it wont let me go up. If i put the coords where i want to stand it will let me go up

You can’t because the object is 2x2. That square is part of the object. Just use the coordinates that you are able to stand on…

item.title: [PI] No idea what to call this
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

Uhm well, basically when i try to go up the stairs, i go directly to this spot

uoi6a.jpg773×509

I need to go to that spot to go up the stairs,
here is the code i used in actionhandler.java

case 11511: if (c.absX == 3105 && c.absY == 3363) { c.getPA().movePlayer(3105, 3364, 2); }

Case 11511: - The staircase ID (c.absX == 3105 && c.absY == 3363) - Where i have to stand (Ive tried where i am standing right now and it didnt work) c.getPA().movePlayer(3105, 3364, 2); - Where it should move me to.
Im trying to add a quest and I need to be able to go up the stairs
